participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Warm-hearted and nurturing, enjoys family time and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I lie to my children about eating healthy. I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day. I have two dogs, one pitbull and an old English bulldog. I learned piano at age 6. I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, enjoys cooking and spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I'd rather wear my overalls and boots. My mother was a school music teacher. I work as a grill cook. I like to spend time with my friends, especially Abigail. Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I'm a grill cook at a local diner.
Oh cool. What's your favorite thing to cook?
That sounds delicious. I'm not much of a cook myself. I'm always lying to my kids about eating healthy.
Haha, I do that too. My mom was a school music teacher so I grew up with a lot of music around me. I like to play the piano sometimes.
That's awesome. I learned piano at age 6, but I haven't played in years. I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.
That sounds like a great idea. I'd love to hear some of your stories.
Sure. I'll tell you all about it next time we chat.
Sounds good. I'm free tomorrow if you want to meet up.
